title: Free stuff?
body: Just got a free icon from you Riot.  no idea why, but I got a lil thank you pop up too.  Dunno what I did or why im getting free stuff, but you're welcome?

replies.body: It looks like you qualified for the Cosmic Ruins Icon by getting 33 kills across Dark Star Singularity map games. Congrats and you're welcome ^_^!
